name: Rek'Sai
title: the Void Burrower
shortBio: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed caravans, will go hundreds of miles out of their way to avoid her and her offspring's hunting grounds. All know that once Rek'Sai is seen on the horizon, death from below is all but guaranteed.

skins.name: Eternum Rek'Sai
skins.description: Somewhere, beneath the soil, you hear the scraping of metal. Suddenly, there comes a screech… A cry of hunger… Then, nothing.

skins.name: Pool Party Rek'Sai
skins.description: We're gonna need a bigger inflatable raft…

skins.name: Blackfrost Rek'Sai

chromas.name: Blackfrost Rek'Sai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: When the Ice Witch looked to the great glaciers of True Ice towering over the far north, she saw an army in the making. Among the first to be sculpted was Rek'Sai, a vessel of chilling savagery befitting a queen's power. Now, granted sentience by the will of the Watchers, she terrorizes domains with the brutal instincts of an apex predator.

skins.name: Elderwood Rek'Sai

chromas.name: Elderwood Rek'Sai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Spore-fiends stalk the deepest reaches of the forest, and Rek'sai is the broodmother from which all others spring. Those who see her hulking form of bloom and bark swimming through the trees rarely live long enough to tell the tale.

skins.name: Primordian Rek'Sai

chromas.name: Primordian Rek'Sai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Primordian Rek'Sai

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Anima Squad event.

skins.description: Final City built its barricades high, protecting its citizens from countless Primordian threats. Rek'Sai laughs in the face of these obstructions—or at least mimics a laugh in the form of a loud, painful screech. Having evolved to tunnel beneath land, she is the ideal infiltrator, the first Primordian to lay eyes on Final City… but certainly not the last.

passive.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
passive.description: Rek'Sai generates Fury by Attacking and hitting with basic Abilities. She consumes this Fury while Burrowed to restore health.

spells.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
spells.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that damages and reveals enemies hit.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Unburrowed:</keywordMajor> Rek'Sai's next 3 Attacks within @BuffDuration@ seconds gain <attackSpeed>@AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed</attackSpeed> and deal an additional <physicalDamage>@TotalDamageTooltip@ physical damage</physicalDamage> to nearby enemies. Attacks refresh the duration of this Ability.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
spells.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Move Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Unburrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Unburrowed:</keywordMajor> Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining access to new Abilities but cannot Attack. She gains <speed>@BurrowedMoveSpeed@ Move Speed</speed>, @VisionRadiusMod*-100@% reduced vision range, and nearby enemies that move and are otherwise unseen will have their positions revealed to Rek'sai and her allies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
spells.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing physical damage, or bonus true damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spells.dynamicDescription: <keywordMajor>Unburrowed:</keywordMajor> Rek'Sai bites a target, dealing <physicalDamage>@spell.RekSaiE:BaseDamage@ physical damage</physicalDamage>. At max <keywordMajor>Fury</keywordMajor>, the bite deals <trueDamage>@spell.RekSaiE:EmpoweredDamage@ true damage</trueDamage> instead.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Void Rush
spells.description: Rek'Sai passively marks targets by damaging them. She can activate this ability to become briefly untargetable and lunge at a marked target for heavy damage based on their maximum health.
spells.dynamicDescription: Rek'Sai targets an enemy damaged by her in the last @PreyMarkDuration@ seconds and then dives underground, becoming Untargetable. Moments later, she leaps unstoppably at her target, dealing <physicalDamage>@RBaseDamageCalc@ plus @PercentHealthDamage@% max Health physical damage</physicalDamage> and resets the cooldown of <keywordMajor>Burrow / Un-burrow</keywordMajor>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
